title: Welcome to Who Can Become A Scientist
description:
Welcome the "Who Can Become A Scientist" Workshop Webiste. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say and stay in touch!

title: "Who Can Become A Scientist" goes live!
description: We are happy to announce our next workshop date!
contents: In partnership with Let’s Talk Science, we will be offering the “Who Can Become A Scientist?” workshop on Wednesday November 10th from 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM during the “World Science Day for Peace and Development”
